import React from 'react' import Input from '../../Components/UI/Input/Input' import MainBtn from '../../Components/UI/MainBtn/MainBtn' import './profile.scss' const Profile = ({ darkMode }) => { const styleObj = { avatarInput: { width: '100%', height: '100%', background: 'f9f9f9', borderRadius: '50%', fontSize: 0, cursor: 'pointer', }, input: { width: '540px', padding: '10px', background: 'f9f9f9', fontSize: '20px', border: '1px solid grey', }, btnStyles: { padding: '10px 25px', borderRadius: '8px', }, backgroundColor: '#29a19c', fontSize: '16px', color: '#fafafa', } return (
save changes
) } export default Profile
